snippet: On Monday, the president will begin a trip that will take him to Greece, Germany and Peru. At every stop, he is sure to be asked how he got the election so wrong....
abstract: Pres Obama will embark on valedictory tour to Greece, Germany and Peru, where he will undoubtedly contend with questions on unexpected victory of Pres-elect Donald J Trump and future ramifications of his administration.
lead_paragraph: On Monday, the president will begin a trip that will take him to Greece, Germany and Peru. At every stop, he is sure to be asked how he got the election so wrong.

headline.main: Obama Heads Overseas, Where Topic of Trump Will Follow Him
headline.print_headline: Obama Heads Overseas, Where Topic of Trump Will Follow Him Everywhere
